Text: Nurses, doctors, & hospital workers have endured & shown such grace in the face of extreme difficulty. I went to Johnson Memorial Hospital yesterday to say a heartfelt thank you. We can all show our thanks to health care professionals by getting vaccinated, boosted, & tested. https://t.co/7IWqmFX2v9

Putin is making a severe miscalculation. Where he thought he could sow division in our transatlantic alliance—he is bringing us closer. Where he aims to limit NATO’s influence—he is proving its strength.

Congress is preparing for all contingencies to meet Putin’s attack on world order with unity & resolve. Many of us on both sides of the aisle have urged powerful economic sanctions—& now bipartisan action must make it happen.

We need immediate crippling sanctions & export controls on Russia, Putin, & his oligarchs. President Biden's announcement was a good first step, but bullies only understand consequences. https://t.co/7pWyBwFSbT

Rising gas prices are creating a perfect storm for families who are feeling the pinch of increasing household costs. Suspending the federal gas tax will provide some relief to consumers—helping cut the cost of getting to work, school, & health care appointments. https://t.co/jBjbiRpsx4

Liuzzi has continued producing incredible quality cheese & selling across the country (soon in Hawaii) during the pandemic— showing passion & perseverance— with help from a PPP loan. The dairy industry deserves support too.
This fantastic American success story involves 6 generations of family making world renowned products. I was thrilled to see Liuzzi cheese made fresh & natural here in Hamden. https://t.co/h9eOL1Zggp

Uncharted waters ahead for gun manufacturers' insurance companies. Sandy Hook families’ heroic perseverance & courage held gun manufacturers liable under state laws (CUTPA). The waters are uncharted no matter what happens with PLCAA, which should be repealed. https://t.co/1skNmrgA2t

Happy President’s Day. Today we celebrate the birthday of our founding father George Washington & honor the leadership of many great American presidents who helped to shape our nation. We need their inspiration more than ever.

This fig leaf, fatuous attempt to legitimize Russia’s flagrant aggression— seemingly setting the stage for invasion— must be met with strong, swift economic sanctions. Many of us advocated for them months ago, but no room for delay now.
As I have urged for months, deterrence depends on consequences & costs to Putin, demonstrated in real time not after the fact.

Putin’s most recent, reckless recognition steps heighten the need for economic sanctions now—swift, sure, severe—making him pay a price for this craven assault on world order. As I saw in my visit, we must show our resolve to stand with Ukraine. https://t.co/VXLdtCiEv5

A chilling reminder of Putin’s ruthless cruelty & contempt for basic human rights. Another reason for sanctions beginning now, not waiting, as I’ve urged for months. He understands only actions, not words. https://t.co/5nPmeifqbQ

During our investigation, athletes told us time & again that the powerful leaders & institutions in charge of Olympic sports prioritized gold medals over athlete safety & health. That’s exactly what has been on display these last two weeks.
.@JerryMoran & my 2020 Empowering Olympic, Paralympic, & Amateur Athletes Act was a first step for the U.S. Olympic movement, but deep, fundamental cultural changes are still imperative worldwide.

Lessons of this Olympics—framed by tearful Russian skaters—are reminiscent of our Congressional investigation where it was crystal clear that Olympic leaders & institutions were enablers. 
https://t.co/KuwlexL1OX

80 years ago, America began the incarceration of 120,000 Japanese Americans, one of the saddest, shameful chapters in our history. As we reflect on this action, we recommit to not repeating these wrongs & preventing such abhorrent civil rights violations.

Hugely inspiring outpouring of support for Ukraine’s freedom & democracy today at our state Capitol—standing in solidarity against Russian invasion. I was honored to talk about my visit to Ukraine last month & continued to call for sanctions against Russia—now. https://t.co/gphGu0Ux7o

Thank you to the doctors & nurses at Generations Family Health Center in Willimantic for all your efforts throughout the pandemic. You are our heroes—providing critical services in our community. https://t.co/CBPghxE7uD

Replenishment of the Restaurant Revitalization fund is essential to keep our beloved restaurants open. Yesterday Rep. Johnson, Mayor DeVivo, & I got the chance to hear from Willimantic Brewing about the pandemic challenges they have faced & the need for this federal funding. https://t.co/rmSwu2sTBM

Great to be at the VA Hospital in West Haven to talk with staff about the RAISE Act. Congress needs to pass this legislation to keep pace, provide pay increases, & support our wonderful professionals in the VA health care system. https://t.co/HIW3n0gkYh

No one should have to choose between lifesaving insulin & putting food on the table. I join @SenatorWarnock in calling for a $35 per month out-of-pocket cap on this critical medication. Let’s pass the Affordable Insulin Now Act & provide savings to Americans living with diabetes.

Congress & the Biden Administration must heed this message: #HonorOurCommitment. Our great nation should keep its promises & enable at risk Afghan allies who protected our troops & other Americans to escape Taliban retaliation. We must keep faith. https://t.co/tcjnnaZhP5

Under the Sacklers’ leadership, Purdue Pharma committed crimes, destroyed lives, & ravaged communities. My colleagues & I wrote to urge DOJ to criminally investigate Sackler family members for their role in fueling the opioid epidemic. https://t.co/j7kIvpjNfD
This measure makes kids’ safety an internet priority. I will fight for swift passage of the Kids Online Safety Act alongside Senator @MarshaBlackburn, my partner in this effort.

Seared in my memory—& motivating my passion—are countless harrowing stories from CT & across the country about heartbreaking loss, destructive emotional rabbit holes & addictive dark places rampant on social media. Algorithms driven by eyeballs & dollars will no longer hold sway.

Big Tech has failed children & betrayed its trust, putting profits above safety. @MarshaBlackburn & I are introducing the Kids Online Safety Act to give kids & parents the tools & safeguards to protect against toxic content—& hold Big Tech accountable for dangerous algorithms. https://t.co/MmMxAk4Hwd

Outsourcing critical services while paying huge executive salaries certainly raises serious questions about Eversource's priorities. A study will protect consumers by ensuring minimum critical staffing levels for storm response.

CT's utilities cannot be under-prepared. This review of staffing levels at Eversource Energy & United Illuminating is urgently needed. Building stronger in-house repair crews must be part of any emergency preparedness plan. https://t.co/onoc1R8PJR
Zachary Donohue is continuing to make CT proud during these Olympic games. Congrats to you & Madison! https://t.co/eUROsMvohj

Mere minutes is all it takes to find dozens of YouTube videos on how to make & manufacture ghost guns—in clear violation of Community Guidelines. My colleagues & I are demanding that YouTube take action & ensure the content it hosts doesn’t exacerbate the threat of these weapons. https://t.co/pAFU4wGMTB

Congress must act to repeal the Protection of Lawful Commerce in Arms Act so future victims of gun violence can also have their day in court without needing to overcome sweetheart protections that Congress has granted to the gun industry & only the gun industry.

No amount of money will ever bring back the beautiful lives lost at Sandy Hook Elementary School or erase the pain & trauma of this unspeakable tragedy. I think of those precious children & educators & their loved ones every day.

The Sandy Hook families are a profile in courage—& perseverance. This settlement sends a clear message to gun manufacturers that they will be held accountable for these weapons of war. https://t.co/UaCLaq7wrn
Another exciting win for CT’s own Lindsey Jacobellis. Congrats to you & Nick! https://t.co/vxt0BYcWTN

Four years on & the haunting, harrowing images from Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School still provoke an all too familiar stomach-churning feeling. We remember the 17 beautiful lives lost—but honor with action all gun violence victims & survivors. #EndGunViolence https://t.co/tv1jvZgZSD

Frigid winds, but warm hearts. A bittersweet Valentine’s Day as we rallied in Hartford to end community gun violence. We must invest in & support local intervention/prevention programs to stop this scourge. https://t.co/fo6BA1DCiZ

Philips’ breathing machine recall process has been a deeply inadequate, life threatening failure. I join @AGWilliamTong to demand the FDA act swiftly to hold Philips accountable & protect the millions of Americans—& thousands of CT residents—impacted by this recall. https://t.co/lDhzZUZbZC
Detect’s new test could be the smart phone of infectious disease diagnostics.

It would be one & done with Guilford-based Detect’s combo COVID-19 & flu rapid at-home test. Fantastic that this CT company has received a $22.9 million federal grant to further develop this incredibly helpful new technology. https://t.co/AbjwU0Y4Rf

Thrilled to be a part of the 100 day celebration of Avelo Airlines service at Tweed Airport. With the addition of over 100 new jobs & $1+ million in Bipartisan Infrastructure Law funding Tweed will be able to undertake further projects to benefit CT travelers & the local economy. https://t.co/3sgI5zCvQY

Expanding evidence of Tesla safety dangers demonstrates the need for more aggressive action. Federal investigators should push scrutiny into overdrive—putting Tesla’s unsafe practices in park can save lives. https://t.co/EfOosowRFV

Today’s achievement is due to the great work of the 250 organizations & brave survivors who have so courageously lent their voice, experience, & expertise to this effort. Thank you for all that you do. https://t.co/GumBON4Hyj

There is no excuse, tech companies must step up to stop the child sexual abuse that occurs on their platforms. By passing the #EarnItAct out of the Judiciary committee, Congress is taking action to ensure Big Tech prevents, stops, & reports this abuse.
https://t.co/nsslbjfhb3
1 in 3 women & 1 in 4 men have experienced some form of physical violence by an intimate partner: it’s time to strengthen & improve #VAWA & #SupportSurvivors. https://t.co/cXBmueQI9I

If you haven’t had CT pizza—you haven’t had real pizza. #NationalPizzaDay 
https://t.co/Mhx3xej12p
Lindsey Jacobellis is bringing home the gold & making CT proud. Congratulations on your fantastic, historic victory. https://t.co/npRi7nH4m3
Veterans groups have truly come to the rescue. I’m grateful for their support in the continuing effort to enable our at-risk Afghan allies to come to this country.

I'm very deeply concerned, in fact frustrated & even angry, about the slow pace of evacuating at-risk allies from Afghanistan. Our credibility & power around the world depends on keeping our word & supporting a clear, consistent, compassionate evacuation & resettlement strategy. https://t.co/YwYplhBlGS

Count me in. I fully support Congressional staff & their efforts to unionize. Day in & day out they work hard to serve constituents across the country. Like all American workers, our staff deserve the right to organize & have their voices heard.

I agree @SenMarkey, these design choices that seemingly encourage unsafe driving habits—like rolling stops—are deeply worrying. Autopilot & Full Self-Driving technologies must be used to ensure that vehicles follow the rules of the road & don’t circumvent safety standards. https://t.co/1N9I1FNpnX

Infinity is doing amazing work on fuel cells that’ll go into space&help America better compete here on earth. It’s important we pass the US Innovation&Competition Act to support innovative companies&encourage domestic semiconductor manufacturing—alleviating supply chain stresses. https://t.co/vLvDV98iLt
Congrats to USA figure skaters—including CT’s Zachary Donohue—on their fantastic performances & team silver medal. https://t.co/tvAUa0UdIp

All of NATO is ready—standing shoulder-to-shoulder in solidarity with Ukraine. Biden & Scholz's maintenance of a strong deterrent posture is crucial as Macron & Putin's negotiations continue. https://t.co/2NM00DDMgX

The gun violence epidemic is relentless—it takes our kids, it takes our loved ones, it shatters our hearts. This #GVSurvivorsWeek, CT continues to be at the forefront of curbing gun violence. In Congress I will keep fighting for commonsense legislation & urging executive action. https://t.co/kJs6qjOmlN

More action is needed to stop skyrocketing hate-fueled violence. I’ll keep fighting to counter this surge by ensuring Jabara-Heyer NO HATE grants are funded, supporting community-based responses, & closing legal gaps to hold perpetrators accountable. https://t.co/rihUwPdCmk
What a stellar run to bring home the first medal for Team USA. A huge congratulations to Julia Marino. You are making CT proud! https://t.co/CJ8kup3bWY

“Strategic ambiguity” threatens to spread confusion. Scholz must be clear to Putin: invasion of Ukraine means unambiguously shuttering Russia’s gas pipeline. Decisive statements of consequences are needed until Putin backs down. POTUS must press Scholz today for strategic clarity https://t.co/lrb1aWSE1j

Breweries like the Aspetuck Brew Lab are working to overcome rising costs—in ingredients, cans, & more. Funding from the Restaurant Revitalization Fund would help it serve the neighborhood & create jobs. https://t.co/B6p1njbctE

Like other restaurants struggling to survive, the Metric Bar & Grill needs support from the Restaurant Revitalization Fund. I visited Chef Pierre to talk about my fight to replenish it. https://t.co/osNukCHjSL

With a PPP loan & a Restaurant Revitalization Fund grant, @LabyrinthBeer has continued operating during the pandemic, but many of our breweries are still struggling. Congress must provide more RRF funding to enable local businesses to survive & thrive— creating good jobs.

The preemptive right wing dark money attack—on a nominee not yet named—is in effect: Don’t confuse me with the facts. They’ll stop (& start) at nothing. Restoring our highest court’s credibility means a fair, swift confirmation process based on facts, not misinformation.

You’re right @SenWhitehouse this preemptive attack reeks of right-wing dark money. Millions of dollars fueling lies & partisan character attacks, aimed at continuing delay & distortion. https://t.co/FeDesXtoNZ

Stratford’s Veterans Museum is a spectacular teaching tool about the meaning of patriotism & service for all Americans. It’s an inspiring tribute, especially to Stratford vets who have fought & sacrificed, with biographies, photos, & more. Great to visit with Rep. Gresko. https://t.co/v2YhIAJXjS

With the help of American Rescue Plan funding, the Swift Factory has been dynamically restored with 17 thriving businesses & now a branch of the Hartford Public Library. Exciting tour yesterday to learn more about their plans for continued revitalization & growth. https://t.co/3qZuTL3vVd

With millions of Rock’n Play sleepers still in homes & the deaths of more kids, Fisher Price/CPSC need to do more to raise awareness of this recall. My Sunshine in Product Safety Act would give CPSC latitude to inform consumers of dangerous products w/o manufacturer interference. https://t.co/D5VaIOZ0kD

Whether it’s getting people to work, the grocery store, or the doctor’s office, our transit service workers are frontline heroes. I’m proud to have fought for $332.5 million in funding to protect these essential jobs & keep our transportation systems safe & reliable. https://t.co/dTKV1VscOZ

Launching a National Ghost Gun Enforcement Initiative is a critical step toward holding accountable those who commit crimes with these firearms. Congress must also act. Let’s pass my Untraceable Firearms Act to help prevent the proliferation of these dangerous weapons. https://t.co/BabUO8lkyI

Yesterday the Judiciary Committee moved one step closer toward preventing the online app market from being exploited by monopolistic gatekeepers. A huge thank you to all the advocates who have helped champion @MarshaBlackburn & my Open App Markets Act. https://t.co/VT6UwWDuzP
These two murderous autocrats understand action—not rhetorical flourish. Beginning strong economic sanctions now, before a Russian invasion, can signal the costs & consequences.

Two repressive bullies—Putin & Xi—together in testing & threatening the world order. Joined with our own allies, we must be resolute & resilient—impose sanctions on Russia now & provide arms to Ukraine. https://t.co/L8leGD8l42

As we work to #HonorWithAction, stories of survivors propel us towards change. This National Gun Violence Survivors Week, we listen to these heartbreaking experiences & relentlessly recommit to ending the scourge of gun violence. 
https://t.co/erfO9X7GCK

Local journalism has been the lifeblood of America—providing a forum for people to be informed about their community. We are in the 11th hour to protect these irreplaceable & indispensable local news institutions. https://t.co/9cq89cookD

I’m relieved that Medicare patients will be able to have their at-home COVID-19 tests covered, as I’ve strongly called for. I urge CMS to immediately implement this coverage & ensure all Medicare recipients have ample, free access to this critical tool in curbing the pandemic. https://t.co/sTyWq8kvZn

I will continue to lead this strongly bipartisan effort with Senator @MarshaBlackburn, Chair @SenatorDurbin, & my colleagues. Today’s passage by the Judiciary Committee marks another significant step toward full Senate consideration & signing of this important measure into law.
Despite self-interested opposition, our bipartisan success reflects the American public’s view that the online app market is exploited by monopolistic gatekeepers—& needs reform.

Breaking Apple & Google’s ironclad grip on the multi-billion dollar app market will stop their predatory fees on consumers & barriers to start ups & rivals. The Open App Markets Act will lower charges & spur innovation while preserving privacy & security. https://t.co/2fWHcMmjK0

My bill with @JoaquinCastrotx would do just that—allow victims of Trump’s barbaric family separation policy to receive legal status & a pathway to citizenship. We introduced our Families Belong Together Act to ensure they can rebuild their lives in safety. https://t.co/7K0DKylhfz

We must do right by our vets & provide treatment to those suffering from toxic exposure related illnesses. Proud to join @SenatorTester @JerryMoran’s Health Care for Burn Pit Veterans Act that will offer lifesaving VA care to every Post-9/11 combat vet impacted by toxic exposure. https://t.co/cKzgE4eo9r

A very happy Lunar New Year to all celebrating. 

May the #YearOfTheTiger bring you prosperity, health, & happiness.

Wishing @SenatorLujan a swift recovery. 

Take care & feel better soon! https://t.co/spnicidrxa

#BlackHistoryMonth is a time to celebrate the generations of leaders, activists, & trailblazers who have broken barriers & inspired change. This month—& always—we honor this history & recommit to the long fight to stamp out racism & achieve equality.

LIVE: Scammers are reprehensibly using the pandemic to profit at the expense of Americans trying to stay safe&healthy. At today’s hearing I look forward to discussing with the FTC&witnesses tough reforms to protect consumers from fraud&price gouging. https://t.co/DdfNsKAOb4

Proud to stand yesterday with these fierce advocates. I join their call to evacuate & resettle all our at-risk Afghan allies. The U.S. gov’t must honor our commitment & get these individuals & their families to safety—there is no time to waste. https://t.co/ul77zW5xMA

Today is a devastating anniversary, Ethan Song has been gone four years. In his honor, I will continue to fight for the safe storage of firearms to #KeepKidsSafe. By passing Ethan’s Law we can save lives. https://t.co/g4bbGJJ1RW

Millions of these horrifying images go unidentified & unreported by the tech platforms that host them because there are so few consequences when these companies look the other way. That ends with the #EarnItAct. 4
Tech companies have long had ready access to low-cost, or even free tools to combat the scourge of child sexual abuse material, but have failed to act. 3/

The internet is infested with stomach-churning images of children who have been brutally assaulted & exploited, & who are haunted by a lifetime of pain after these photographs & videos are circulated online. 2/

THREAD: The #EarnItAct is very simply about whether tech companies should be held responsible for their complicity in the sexual abuse & exploitation of children when they refuse to report or remove images of these crimes hosted on their platforms. 1/ https://t.co/INUCbefLW4
I’m supporting & fighting for a resolution recognizing the Equal Rights Amendment as rightly part of our Constitution. This battle is bipartisan & we’re determined to win it. https://t.co/uSorCeEmVm

To all the doctors, nurses, & health care staff at Backus Hospital from the bottom of my heart thank you for your tireless work & dedication. As the pandemic continues, you time & time again show that you are true heroes. https://t.co/H82Y8O8WeE
The Coast Guard will be hard at work, before & during the upcoming winter storm, making sure commercial commerce & fishermen, & all on the shore, are safe.

Winter weather freezing our waterways clogs up commerce & prevents heating oil from making it to homes. Luckily we have the @USCG_Tri_State & their fleet to help break the ice & keep things afloat. Thrilled to join their crew today for one of their ice breaking missions. https://t.co/MEK715GtpF

My father was one of the lucky few to escape Nazi Germany, but 6 million Jews—& millions of other victims—faced deadly horrors. We must #NeverForget the lives lost & in their memory stand up against anti-Semitism & hate in all forms. #HolocaustRemembranceDay https://t.co/VE6pCA7cWZ

I’m proud to have recommended her nomination to the White House with @ChrisMurphyCT &  I look forward to advocating for her confirmation in the Senate Judiciary Committee, where I anticipate strong bipartisan support.

Vanessa Avery is a proven prosecutor—tough & fair—who has deep roots in her community & a lifetime of service. A champion & fighter for CT’s people w/broad trial experience & solid, good judgement, she’ll follow the facts & law to deter & punish wrongdoers & fight discrimination. https://t.co/rNGqC5PX4I
The credibility of the Court has never been more threatened & its independence & authority more at risk. I look forward to a swift confirmation process.

I hope that Justice Breyer’s successor will have the same extraordinary qualities of intellect & integrity as well as commitment to the Constitutional freedoms & guarantees that make our country great.

Justice Breyer’s service has been unsurpassed in distinction as a pragmatic progressive—ever an optimist, but grounded firmly in the real-life consequences of the Court’s decisions. He is a brilliant scholar&thinker who has sought practical, workable solutions in a divided Court. https://t.co/goJE4Letb6

Childcare in our state is being financially squeezed in a COVID vice. Yesterday I joined providers at The School For Young Children in West Hartford to call for federal support for additional COVID testing supplies, PPE, & assistance to help families pay for childcare. https://t.co/aF1vslc3HR

I’ve long advocated sanctions against Putin targeting his personal fortune—vast secret assets gained by corruptly exploiting his own people. Exposing them would be a revelation. Freezing them would hit Putin where it hurts. Strong deterrence&continued negotiations are needed now. https://t.co/NOba3w7ZPi

I agree w/Biden—no US troops to Ukraine—but my trip there convinces me we need strong deterrent action, NOW. (Powerful economic sanctions—beginning before any invasion—along w/heightened arms airlifts&explicit allied unity on stopping energy flow.) Our window is tightening. https://t.co/h6hi4Xoyhh

Congrats to Marine Heavy Helicopter Squadron (HMH) 461 on becoming the @USMC’s first CH-53K squadron. This game changer from @Sikorsky will supply & support forward-deployed Marines for years to come. https://t.co/rz7yzcdkG9

Removing household hazards like mold, mildew, pests, radon, & lead will help to keep families safer & minimize childhood ailments like asthma. I was grateful to be in New Haven today to announce a federal grant to help get rid of these dangers. https://t.co/U8UZhE15sn
Congress must urgently meet this moment in the privacy crisis by passing a comprehensive law that provides the privacy protections that Americans need & deserve.

I’ve long raised alarm over Google’s location data deceptions. Big Tech’s lies must stop. The stunning allegations in this bipartisan suit show, yet again, that tech companies continue to mislead, deceive, & prioritize profits over protecting user privacy. https://t.co/Mnm93KsGWJ

Strong export controls that hit hard on Putin’s economy—no semiconductors, for example—must begin NOW, not after invasion. Economic sanctions, export controls, arms lifts, & allied unity are needed to increase Russian costs & back Putin down. https://t.co/G8A23XMJ9Q
Enabling at-risk Afghan allies to escape is a moral imperative. They put their lives on the line to protect Americans, with the promise we’d protect them. https://t.co/sr7ELaghZK
Congratulations! You & Mike are true heroes who are so deeply deserving of this honor. We will keep fighting to pass Ethan’s Law. https://t.co/s09k4WzSq1
Wonderful spirit at test distribution sponsored by Cathedral of Praise in Bridgeport—making families & community safer together. Thank you! https://t.co/blsiKJIzer

Putin’s next step could be invasion, or coup, or both—using saboteurs, or armed forces, or both. As we heard during our trip & reported British intel supports, his m.o. is coercion&force. Like any bully, he must be convinced the consequences&costs will be massive&prohibitive.

What we saw in Ukraine last week was real time hybrid war combining cyberattack, military action, & misinformation, designed to degrade Ukraine’s present government & bring back Ukraine to Russian dominance.

These reports leave no doubt: deterrence is urgent. Starting strong economic sanctions & smart, effective arms airlifts, NOW. Clear unity with allies, especially Germany explicitly saying it will end big natural gas buys, NOW.

Reported British intel confirms one of the chief concerns raised during our bipartisan Ukraine visit—a Russian puppet takeover to support Putin’s ongoing aggression. Destabilizing, dividing, & demoralizing the Ukrainian government & people are key tactics in Putin’s playbook. https://t.co/q2lpWBt84o
CT can lead all states in protecting #RoeVWade’s rights & reproductive freedoms—as it forms a special legislative caucus to stand strong with action. https://t.co/cbHL0g3ogw

No question, Congress must pass a Code of Conduct for the Supreme Court. I’ve advocated it for years, with mandates for financial disclosure & recusal where the Court’s impartiality & credibility are undermined. https://t.co/R8ZQxHkrnN

Lines of cars—even in the bitter cold—receiving tests here at Seaside Park in Bridgeport. Great to join dedicated workers from Bridgeport’s Health Department in distributing these tests that enable people to get back to work & school safely. https://t.co/eQtreLuiYT

Rail will be revolutionized in the Northeast Corridor with billions in federal infrastructure funding. Safety, reliability, speed, & comfort, all will be hugely enhanced—engendering jobs & economic expansion. https://t.co/h09MMLZDMf
It's a break the glass moment, not a drill, in the fight for reproductive freedoms. With #RoeVWade in mortal danger, there’s no excuse for silence or complacency.
On this dark 49th anniversary, #RoeVWade is hanging by a thread—likely to be overturned by SCOTUS & under assault by state legislatures. Passing WHPA is absolutely vital.

As the Sport & Medical Sciences Academy community continues to grieve last week’s tragic loss, I met with Superintendent Rodriguez, Principal Giuliano, & Mayor Bronin to learn more about how federal resources can assist schools in dealing with drug use & mental health services.

This morning I stopped by Camp Hartell where the @CTNationalGuard are working hard to distribute COVID tests & PPE to nursing homes. This equipment is critical to helping residents & staff stay safe. https://t.co/G8ZCmP9Wn7

Talking rather than attacking is a promising result from US-Russian meeting, but we are far from being in the clear. Continued strong bipartisan support—in arms & economic sanctions, NOW—is critical to deter Putin.

A clear message must be sent—Russia will pay costs, & there will be consequences. This legislation will provide necessary military equipment for the people of Ukraine as they defend their sovereignty & livelihoods with courage & strength.

As Putin seeks to divide, demoralize & degrade democracies with his hybrid war of cyber, military action & misinformation, the Ukraine Democracy Defense Lend-Lease Act expands our ability to provide Ukrainian people w/the tools & resources necessary to deter & resist any attack.
We must defend America. We must renew our nation’s commitment to protecting voting rights in this country. We simply cannot afford to give up this fight.

There is no democratic freedom more fundamental than the right to vote. For decades, the filibuster has been a weapon against the advancement of civil rights—& tonight was no different. I’m disappointed—even devastated—but I’m not disheartened.

Our democracy depends on defending the right to vote.

We have a chance today to protect against the cascading, escalating wave of voter suppression threatening to undermine our free & fair elections. 

Let’s get it done. #FreedomToVote

The filibuster & procedural tactics must not stand in the way of protecting people’s right to vote.

Let’s pass the Freedom to Vote Act & John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act.
Every CT household can now order free at-home COVID-19 tests delivered right to your door. It only takes a minute—sign up today: https://t.co/A6Pm4G9lU3
Cheers to @AnnNyberg as she celebrates 35 years @WTNH. Your dedication & devotion to CT news viewers is to be admired.

We must protect voting rights against a new era of hostility. Plain & simple, this should not be a partisan issue. 

Last night I took to the Senate floor to call for action. Let’s pass the Freedom to Vote Act & John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act. https://t.co/v69RkKOUwc

Celebrating Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. means recommitting ourselves to the fight for equality, justice, & civil rights. The fight is far from won, but Dr. King’s legacy offers an enduring reservoir of hope & courage, providing resilience & strength.

In this urgent, historic moment we must show that we stand strong with the people of Ukraine in defending against brazen, craven Russian aggression—a message that we will be delivering together face to face.

I’m excited to be part of this significant mission at a defining moment for Ukraine, Russia & our national security. Personal meetings with Ukraine’s top leaders & American officials will enable & embolden our case in Congress for aid & action.
Traveling to Ukraine with a bipartisan group of Senate colleagues to reaffirm the United States’ unwavering, unstinting commitment to our ally. https://t.co/sgZGra1iAx

It’s not too late to sign up for health care coverage. Open enrollment ends TODAY at midnight. @AccessHealthCT is here to help you find the best plan that works for you & your family. 
https://t.co/P3app6QTc1
Russia must know that there will be consequences, severe & serious, if they invade.

Russia’s use of saboteurs & cyberattacks against Ukraine as a possible step toward invasion shows the need for strong action now—more military assistance, particularly lethal offensive weapons as I’ve urged, & preparation of sanctions, working with NATO allies.

Continued cruises lead to confusion & chaos—as well as danger. Better to cancel before ships go to sea. Norwegian provides a teaching moment.

https://t.co/5btz3B6tow

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Bill is a once in a lifetime opportunity to rebuild our bridges—giving CT over $560 million for repairs, upgrades, & replacements. Investments in structures like the Bissell Bridge in Windsor will reduce gridlock, create jobs, & improve safety. https://t.co/C5dSChRsqR

An icon, inspiration, & legal giant who fought tirelessly for civil rights & for every person’s right to equal protection of the law, Judge Motley spent her entire life giving back to her community & breaking barriers. Congress should honor her achievements & legacy.

Constance Baker Motley—a New Haven native & the first Black woman to argue before the Supreme Court & serve as a federal judge—was a trailblazer who paved the way for so many. I’m proud to have introduced legislation to award her the Congressional Gold Medal with my colleagues. https://t.co/UCLLRe64Dh

Now, the Senate must act to fortify & reinforce our institutions from poisonous, toxic attempts to restrict access to the ballot box under the guise of “mass voter fraud” & “stolen elections.” We must protect voting rights & our democracy.

Today, my thoughts are with Capitol Police, Hill staffers, reporters, & all the essential custodial, food service, and other staff who serve our country & work in our temple of democracy in the name of public service.

There is a direct through line from the Big Lie and the January 6 assault incited by Donald Trump, to violent extremism & domestic terrorism, to voter suppression & the overturning of elections, eventually to the destruction of our democracy.

But January 6 was not a one-off. It was not an isolated or aberrant incident. It was a symptom & a symbol of a deeper destructive violence of radical extremism, a virus of domestic terrorism that continues to infect our nation.

On this solemn anniversary, I’m reminded of how fragile & endangered our democratic institutions are when our leaders fail to protect them, & how close we came to shattering the traditions & norms & losing our democracy.

Fueled by the Big Lie & baseless falsehoods of massive fraud, those domestic terrorists & violent extremists stormed the Capitol & hunted lawmakers & others while defacing & debasing not just the building, but the concept of democracy.

It’s been one year since we were all witnesses to an abhorrent attack on our democracy. Rioters armed with bats & pipes, a Confederate flag in the halls of Congress, ruthless attacks on police officers—not a week goes by where I don’t think about that dark, terrible day.
My personal thanks to the CT family that shared food with snow bound drivers—including my colleague @timkaine—on frozen I-95 in Virginia. You were the talk of the Senate. https://t.co/QaR2duxLOF

One thing is clear from my visits to testing sites & distribution centers all across CT—we need more federal action to increase test supply. Expanded use of the Defense Production Act & other federal resources will help us in stemming this wave of the pandemic.

Just stopped by South Windsor’s COVID test distribution site where lines of cars stretched for over a mile. People are desperate to get tested in order to protect themselves & others & stop the spread.

Everywhere I visited today & across the state, CT is deeply thankful for free tests. Along with vaccinations & other steps, tests are key to conquering COVID—safely going back to school, to work, & to normal.
The federal government must expand use of the Defense Production Act to manufacture more tests. The demand is undeniable & urgent. The promised 500 million is a start, but billions are needed.
Lines of cars show need for urgent federal action to provide more tests. These pictures are worth a thousand words.

As we begin 2022, I wish you good health, new opportunities & love of friends & family. A joyous New Year!

He repeated it & lived by it as a champion of working Americans who may have modest means, work hard, & simply want a fair chance. He lived the American dream, & fought for all who sought it.
What moved us most—& what made him a great leader—was the loyalty & affection he inspired. His advice to me in my first tough vote was “follow your conscience.”

Harry Reid was short on small talk & soft of voice, but he was tall & strong on values & vision. His penetrating insight, powerful will, & fierce work ethic made him a mentor & role model for so many of us.

Now that they have targets on their backs, we must honor our commitment to enable their escape from death & torture. Our at-risk Afghan allies deserve no less.

For two decades, Afghan men & women put their lives on the line to serve the U.S. mission as translators, guards, civil servants, & humanitarian workers. In moments of danger & crisis, they were there for us.

The U.S. has a moral imperative to help at-risk Afghan allies now in mortal danger because they aided our mission. I’m proud to introduce the Honor Our Commitment Act to establish a clear, consistent, compassionate strategy for their evacuation & resettlement.
